HiiHAT

Developer Documentation for HiiHAT IDL functions.

Overview Directory File Source Etc Categories Search Index Warnings Help Developer documentation

Directory: util/

.pro files

hiihat_assert.pro

Assert that a given statement is true, otherwise clear the system of all files, ROI's

hiihat_check_file.pro

File checking function for hiihat ui.

hiihat_classify_mindist.pro

Minimum distance to class means classifier.

hiihat_distance_matrix.pro

Calculate a distance matrix between a set of spectra

hiihat_divide_mean.pro

Divide image by mean or mean column spectrum

hiihat_generate_class_colors.pro

Generates n_classes rgb colors for spectral libraries and ROIs

hiihat_get_mean_spectrum.pro

Calculates the mean spectrum from a set of pixels, detecting bad (infinite) and zeroed pixels

hiihat_load_rois.pro

Loads the set of temporarily saved ROIs in IDL_TMPDIR/tmp.roi, if available

hiihat_lowpass_image_filter.pro

Perform low-pass image filtering on the given image

hiihat_median_filter_image.pro

Median filter image

hiihat_nm_wavetable_lookup.pro

Seeks the closest nm wavelength in a given wavelength vector and returns its band number

hiihat_normalize_array.pro

Normalize an input array by the L1, L2, or L Inf norm

hiihat_normalize_image.pro

Normalize an input image by the L1, L2, or L Inf norm

hiihat_rainbow_index.pro

Takes an index between 0 and 1 and maps it to a rainbow spectra that returns an appropriate 24 bit integer representation in RGB space.

hiihat_save_rois.pro

Saves the current set of ROIs to IDL_TMPDIR/temp.roi

hiihat_seg_purity.pro

Calculate the overall and per-segment "purity" with respect to a given class map.

hiihat_segment_spectra.pro

Calculates mean signatures for a given image using its corresponding segmentation image, optionally returns the "mean image" populated with the calculated segments.

hiihat_spec_difference.pro

returns a floating point value representing distance between two spectra

hiihat_split_data.pro

Utility function for splitting labeled data across multiple folds for cross-validation.

hiihat_strreplace.pro

Replaces first instance of one string inside another, works on arrays as well

hiihat_write_spectrum.pro

Write out a spectrum both as a text file and a SLI img file.
